Song.title: Though You Slay Me
Song.copyright: Beth Barnard, Brian Woods, Josh Moore, Lauren Chandler, Shane Barnard

Arrangement.text:
verse 1: I [Em]come, God, I [D]come I r[Am]eturn to the [Em]Lord The one who’s[C] broken The one who’s [G]torn me apart [D] You strike[Em] down to bind me[D] up You say you[Am] do it all in [Em]love That I might [C]know you [G]in your suff[D]ering
chorus: Though you [C]slay [G]me [Em]Yet I will [D]praise you Though you [C]take from[G] me [Em]I will bless your[D] name Though you [C]ruin [G]me [Em]Still I will wo[D]rship Sing a [C]song to the one who’s [D]all I n[C]eed
{new_page} verse 2: My [Em]heart and flesh may [D]fail The [Am]earth below give [Em]way But with my [C]eyes, with my [G]eyes I’ll see the [D]Lord Lifted [Em]high on that [D]day Behold, the[Am] Lamb that was [Em]slain And I’ll [C]know every [G]tear was worth it [D]all [Em C Em C]
bridge: [Am]Though tonight I’m [Em]crying out [D]Let this cup pass [Am]from me now [C]You’re still more than I ne[Em]ed You’re [C]enoug[G]h for me [Em] You’re [C]enoug[G]h for me [D]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i come god i come i return to the lord the one whos broken the one whos torn me apart you strike down to bind me up you say you do it all in love that i might know you in your suffering chorus though you slay me yet i will praise you though you take from me i will bless your name though you ruin me still i will worship sing a song to the one whos all i need verse 2 my heart and flesh may fail the earth below give way but with my eyes with my eyes ill see the lord lifted high on that day behold the lamb that was slain and ill know every tear was worth it all bridge though tonight im crying out let this cup pass from me now youre still more than i need youre enough for me youre enough for me

Arrangement.description: Key of D, change to E
Arrangement.text:
verse 1: I [Bm]come, God, I [A]come I r[Em]eturn to the [Bm]Lord The one who’s[G] broken The one who’s [D]torn me apart [A] You strike[Bm] down to bind me[A] up You say you[Em] do it all in [Bm]love That I might [G]know you [D]in your suff[A]ering
chorus: Though you [G]slay [D]me [Bm]Yet I will [A]praise you Though you [G]take from[D] me [Bm]I will bless your[A] name Though you [G]ruin [D]me [Bm]Still I will wo[A]rship Sing a [G]song to the one who’s [A]all I n[G]eed
{new_page} verse 2: My [Bm]heart and flesh may [A]fail The [Em]earth below give [Bm]way But with my [G]eyes, with my [D]eyes I’ll see the [A]Lord Lifted [Bm]high on that [A]day Behold, the[Em] Lamb that was [Bm]slain And I’ll [G]know every [D]tear was worth it [A]all [Bm G Bm G]
bridge: [Em]Though tonight I’m [Bm]crying out [A]Let this cup pass [Em]from me now [G]You’re still more than I ne[Bm]ed You’re [G]enoug[D]h for me [Bm] You’re [G]enoug[D]h for me [A | B (key change) |]
{key:E} chorus: Though you [A]slay [E]me [C#m]Yet I will [B]praise you Though you [A]take from[E] me [C#m]I will bless your[B] name Though you [A]ruin [E]me [C#m]Still I will wo[B]rship Sing a [A]song to the one who’s [B]all I n[C#m]eed Sing a [A]song to the one who’s [B]all I n[C#m]eed Sing a [A]song to the one who’s [B]all I n[E]eed
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i come god i come i return to the lord the one whos broken the one whos torn me apart you strike down to bind me up you say you do it all in love that i might know you in your suffering chorus though you slay me yet i will praise you though you take from me i will bless your name though you ruin me still i will worship sing a song to the one whos all i need verse 2 my heart and flesh may fail the earth below give way but with my eyes with my eyes ill see the lord lifted high on that day behold the lamb that was slain and ill know every tear was worth it all bridge though tonight im crying out let this cup pass from me now youre still more than i need youre enough for me youre enough for me chorus though you slay me yet i will praise you though you take from me i will bless your name though you ruin me still i will worship sing a song to the one whos all i need sing a song to the one whos all i need sing a song to the one whos all i need
